name: 普保羅
objective: Students will first learn how to apply vector and bitmap operations to understand digital designs and improve their creative ability. Students can use existing vector graphics production tools to create their own digital works. This course will arrange practical exercises on vector graphic drawing, and encourage students to participate in competitions and various practical commercial designs. Students will be able to accumulate their digital creation and design strength to establish the creative concept of digital design.
schedule:
1. Intro to vector graphics and UI overview (Adobe Illustrator)
2. Navigating and understanding UI
3. Working with Objects
4. Working with Shapes
5. Logo Design
6. Appearance of Objects
7. Working with Effects
8. Vector drawing Tools
9. Mid-term
10. Complex Drawing I
11. Complex Drawing II
12. Working with other applications I
13. Working with other applications II
14. Finalize working project
15. Commercial Cases Study
16. Final project I
17. Final project II
18. Final Project Presentation
scorePolicy:
attendance rate 20%
practical exercises 20%
Mid-term 30%
Final project 30%
materials: Adobe Illustrator Classroom in a Book (2021 release) 1st Edition, by Brian Wood Publisher:  Adobe Press; 1st edition (December 22, 2020)
